documentation.text:
@dev transfer ownership of this contract
@param g_ the new governance address

attributes.text:
@dev transfer ownership of this contract
@param g_ the new governance address

distributeClaim(uint256,uint256,address).details: called by the binary options contract to claim Reward for user

params.amountOther: the amount in BIOP to transfer to this user for trading/settling
params.amountStaker: the amount in BIOP to transfer to this user for staking
params.claimant: the address who triggered the function and is paying the gas cost*

getLPStakingBonus(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: called by the binary options contract to claim Reward for user

params.lastInterchange: the total interchange the last time the LP staked/claimed
params.totalInterchange: amount interchanged since LPs last claim
params.totalStaked: the total amount staked by all LPs*

params.amount: the amount of value in the binary option
params.completion: false for open position, true for exercise expire*
